jbb.engine.mouseland
Class MouseTrap

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.Tile
      jbb.engine.Item
          jbb.engine.mouseland.MouseTrap

public class MouseTrap
extends Item

The Mouse Class is a subclass of Item and a Mouse Trap can be dropped by the MouseHero

Author:
Bruno Colantonio

pickedUp

public void pickedUp(Avatar avatar)
the pickedUp method uses the parameter avatar and checks to see if the MouseTrap is an instance of Mouse and if it is, it will remove a life of the Mouse

Specified by:
pickedUp in class Item
Parameters:
avatar - is who the MouseTrap has collided with
